website_summaries.verdict: These water-friendly sandals provide durability and support, and look good while doing it.
pros: Comes in black-grey, black-white multi, North Atlantic, plum truffle, Bering Sea, simply taupe and taupe multi (Zappos)
Neoprene foam with stretch mesh lining
cons: Some find these ankle straps uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They use to last. They don’t anymore. Only worn maybe 4 months due to winter and they are coming apart. Been buying a pair every year and all are coming unglued in same place. Not the same product I bought in the past where they would last for 4 or 5 years or longer. Too pricey for the value they provide. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WJH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent arch support
customer_reviews.text: I also ordered the Crocs Swiftwater and the ViaKix Womens Hiking Sandals and I liked the Tevas (Pictured at left, black shoes) the best. They had much better arch support than either of the others. The staps feel comfortable and the size was as expected (size 8, regular width feet). In comparison the Crocs have almost no arch support. The Viakix feel as though there is arch support initially, but it weirdly compresses as you walk (the sole is not as stiff) and therefore don't provide true support. They also ran a little shorter (I saw that some people experienced the Tevas being too long, so maybe they would prefer the Viakix in length).
customer_reviews.author: Liz_ SF

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I own three other pairs of this exact style and they have been well built shoes. This pair is cheaply built. The straps are unraveling and falling apart. This color doesn’t have the same strap strength as the other colors. I wish I could send them back. Truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have hard to fit feet, wide width, occasional plantar fasciitis and metatarsal issues. Right out of the box, I love these shoes. Very comfortable, adjustable and I can walk all over the place wearing these. As I write this review we are self-isolating because of COVID-19 potential exposure. We have no symptoms but we are being extra careful. That keeps us at home taking multiple walks a day in our neighborhood. It is hot here in Florida and these shoes are comfortable, supportive and still keep my feet from sweating. I have never been more satisfied with a new pair of shoes and I have been wearing shoes for over 60 years!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Not for extended wear. Decent water shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear at Disney last summer. These gave me insane blisters and achy feet. Took a chance and attempted to wear for a three day music festival where I walked approx 25,000 steps each day. The first day my feet ached after two hours and I had to go buy a pair of tennis shoes. I’d say they are fine water shoes, but may not the the best for extensive wear.
customer_reviews.author: aubrey49

customer_reviews.title: Possible knockoff poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many pairs of Tevas. This is the first pair bought online. I’m questioning whether it’s a knockoff. They started out really hard on the soles. The straps are still stiff but the soles are really soft and worn even though I’ve only worn them a few times. My other pairs of Tevas were great and lasted two years. Perhaps buying in the store is better. Also there are A LOT of fake reviews here according to Fake spot. Amazon needs to try harder!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide with or narrow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these sandals are da kine...outstanding! True to size. Fully adjustable. Great for wide with or narrow; I'm wide with. The straps are cushioned. The arch support IMMEDIATELY took my heel pain away. I'm so excited to walk pain free. The fashion is in line with other support or sport sandals. I bought 2 pair this morning and received them at 530pm the same day; exceptional delivery. I have always struggled to find shoes that REALLY eliminate my plantar fasciitis and these worked IMMEDIATELY. I'm a size 10 M. I got the black and gray and the deep blue. Please don't ever discontinue. Ask questions if you are debating this purchase. It's a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: VJR

customer_reviews.title: Good support and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I like that all the straps are adjustable on these shoes. I also have a pair of Keen sandals and I like that these are completely adjustable compared to the other shoes I purchased. These are comfortable but I don’t like the ankle strap, it will take my foot a bit to get used to it. After a few times wearing these and breakingbthem in I am sure they will become more comfortable. I would recommend these again but let people know the ankle strap may take a bit to get used to. These shoes to support my foot though and as a suffer of plantar fasciitis I am always looking for cute shoes that support my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephene Dill

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap is a fatal design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I SOOOO wanted to be one of the reviewers who could rave about these. I generally love Teva. Unfortunately, like other negative reviewers, I found the ankle strap design to be terrible and the strap cuts into my ankle in multiple areas. I thought I might try to break them in but my husband talked some sense into me. One look and he could see that they would be impossible to break in because of the design of the strap. Otherwise the footbed was fantastic--cushy and great arch support. Totally bummed. Teva should really rethink that ankle strap design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These must be fake Tevas or a old branding of this style. I purchased the same style and size year previous and they were fine these were garbage. The material was uneven and caused rubbing against my feet. I ended up throwing them away on vacation because I did not have room to repack and return them as I had to purchase new shoes on vacation to replace these trashwears. Unsure if I would purchase Tevas again at this point these shoes were awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style vs. Comfort (comfort wins!)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are heavenly! Purchased a size 9.5 and they fit perfectly. I am very impressed with how comfortable they are. I’ve been wearing them all day (10-12hrs) while at home during this covid 19 pandemic. The style is a bit older for me (43yrs) but the comfort is worth it. Who needs to look cool?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable support
customer_reviews.text: I have seemingly ever foot problem imaginable - plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, hammer toes, ingrown toe nails - you get the picture. These shoes absorb at the heel to minimize pain. They have two adjustable straps across the front and one around the back so I can adjust them for width and comfort. The arch support is solid; a good substitute for my orthotic. They are water proof and dry quickly. These are a perfect “sport” sandal for someone with feet problems. I imagine they will be great for anyone without all my feet problems, too. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia WALKER

customer_reviews.title: great overall sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many different Teva sandals and this is one of the most comfortable and versatile. We have both the kids version and adult version and my daughter and I are both very happy with the comfort and fit. We walk a lot, we hike on moderate trails and our shoes need to be able to get wet, do well on sand, rocks and must be washable. I have never been disappointed by a pair of Tevas - they are reliable and last but these are also able to go with a dress and work in town and out on the trails ... perfect all around compromise for me ...
customer_reviews.author: jazzfan

customer_reviews.title: I have had some great Teva sandals that I bought 2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have had some great Teva sandals that I bought 2 years ago. I finally needed to replace them and bought what I thought was identical. But, the strap is made of thinner fabric, and the sole is thinner and does not conform as well to my foot. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Minden

customer_reviews.title: Teva Tirra sandals hurt my ankles
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were very uncomfortable because they hurt the front part of my ankles. I tried loosening the straps, but they still hurt. I returned these sandals to Teva for an exchange or site credit. I did not try another pair of Tirras so I don't know if all Tirras hurt. If I had to purchase Tirras again, I'd only do so after trying them on in a store if available. If you're having issues with any of your newly purchased Tevas, I suggest contacting Teva and they will try to resolve any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Unrivaled Support. My everyday black sandles..
customer_reviews.text: My feet hurt even getting out of bed in the morning. I over-pronate and have very high arches that collapse when I stand so that my ankles curve in. My feet are trashed from working on my them through my 20s and always wearing bad shoes, not knowing better. Plantar fascia is aggravated easily. I wear these shoes every day since I ordered them and they are a God-send. Very supportive through the arch and heel. Thick, firm, molded material. Also, they're cute! I got the black ones that match with everything. No grandma shoes for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap needs break-in time
customer_reviews.text: Ankle strap is a little rough or scratchy (not sure how to exactly describe it) so I wore these sandals with socks for a break-in period and now it is comfortable. I bought these because of the extra arch support and it does a much better job than other styles and other sandals, but it could be a little more to be perfect. I love the look and I love that the straps all adjust with Velcro-type closure. I need that because my right leg, ankle, and foot swell at times. This shoe gives me the option to adjust as needed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but the soles rub my feet the wrong way...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim. I have been looking at Chacos and Tevas for awhile. I thought I would be in love! I always have horrible luck with buying shoes online. I have many pairs just stuck in my closet. :( anyway, these shoes are okay. They are comfy and I can wear them all day. Sadly, they seem to rub after a few hours on the soles of my feet. I started adding deodorant to my soles of my feet to try and help the problem. After hour 6, it feels like I’m walking on sand paper. Anyway, maybe I’ll break them in.
customer_reviews.author: CheshireCat

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but
customer_reviews.text: My friend who recommended the sandals probably would put 5+ stars. She loves them and wears them all year around, even in winter in Chicago. They are comfy, good arch and heel support. My cons: #1 the scratchy synthetic material, that doesn't feel good on my feet; #2 for size 11 they look like men's sandals,. if you don't care how your feet look, or you have size 9 and below, the sandals are grate. I am returning them and replacing with the one made from soft leather and look more feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for Disney World!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something other than tennis shoes for Disney World since we were going in warmer weather this time. I bought these Tevas and 2 pairs of Keens to see which was the most cushion-y because my feet ache after a Disney World day. After walking around my house, these felt more comfortable than the Keens. They did great at Disney World! So glad I got them and will use them often. They also dried quickly after the huge rainstorm we were in too. -Kate
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Hate the sole material, not too keen on the straps either
customer_reviews.text: I really thought these sandals were going to be great. Visually appealing, nice color, the straps are adjustable, and great arch support but they're just not working out. I kept loosening the straps and they still seem to dig into the top of my feet. My biggest issue is with the sole material. The material is extremely uncomfortable on my feet. I've worn them a dozen times hoping I could break them in, but I've had to accept that they're just not for me. I purchased them for a trip to the Greek Islands that got canceled due to the pandemic. I guess the only good thing about the cancellation is that I didn't kill my feet with these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Not like my first pair of Teva
customer_reviews.text: I have an older pair of Teva's that I've just about worn out so I wanted to get another pair. After looking at the reviews, I decided to get these. The straps feel like they have something very hard sewn into them. I wore them out for a 3 mile walk and the tops of my feet have big blisters on them. I don't know if they'll soften up as I wear them but the first Teva's did not need a break in time. They were wearable right out of the box. These, I'm no so sure of. I'm going to keep them in the hopes they will soften.
customer_reviews.author: happyperson

customer_reviews.title: Great Support!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! I have bone spurs and arthritis in my ankle. These work great. They have arch support and support in the straps around the ankle. They also have a nice supportive snug fit around the ankle and heel. They are also nicr and cushioned throughout. Not too flat. So a great comfy sandal! I have a very wide toe bed. These works great for that! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Brown

customer_reviews.title: Never wear out , look trendy, and color hides dirt!
customer_reviews.text: I still have my first pair of these! They last forever it seems! I wear them camping, in the the water, hiking, just around town on hot days! I said I was a 7 & 1/2 and they sent a pair of 8 that fit perfect! like my old pair of 7&1/2...so they did the adjustment and I am a happy camper! I literally lived in my old pair every day for years! 8 plus years! They have adjustable straps if you have wide feet like me; I am a triple E. These would make a great donation for your favorite Charity . A homeless person wouldn't have to go without shoes for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandles!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Chaco lover for some time now. My Chacos were great but have started to tear badly on the bottom. When I was looking for these shoes i wanted something that would be cute with sundresses, while still being very comfortable. Well these are extremely comfortable. I love them. I walk in them, and wear them with almost anything. Actually I have never owned a pair of Tevas but I think I'm a convert now. I haven't owned them for long, so we will see now they hold up over time but as of now I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Willams

customer_reviews.title: If you have trouble finding comfortable shoes, look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. I've had Teva sandals before, but these are the most comfortable I've ever worn. All three straps adjust, so if you have bunions you can make the top looser, and they have a backstrap so you're not curling up your second toe when walking to keep the shoes on. The arch support is just right -- not too little and not too much. I already bought a second pair and am wearing them all the time. Even now that it is colder out and winter, I wear them around the house with socks on (because, again, since they adjust so well you can just loosen the straps so thick socks fit with them.
customer_reviews.author: DMurph3

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sport sandal has great arch support. I have plantar fasciitis and fallen arches. I need good support. This was a great value as these were $20 less than every other place I checked. It’s like wearing a good athletic shoe with strong arch support in a sandal! Love the off center toe straps, also. Gives it a more modern look. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the upper strap & arch support.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of this style that I have tried & returned in the last couple of weeks. I thought the first pair might have been a fluke, but I had the same problems with the second pair. I believe it’s a design flaw/defect. The upper strap sits too low & cuts into my leg when flexing my foot to take a step to walk. Even though it looks like it has a good arch support, upon standing it feels like there is none.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best all around sandal
customer_reviews.text: First pair of these I purchased last year for a trip where I wanted something I could wear almost anywhere. I walked several miles a day and never got blisters. I get blisters in a flash. They were constantly comfortable and look nice enough that I was okay to wear them w/ skirts. I ordered another pair to have black and the price was amazing!. I say they fit as expected but that is because I know they run slightly shorter so I order 1/2 size larger. Width is perfect and adjustable. I unintentionally went hiking in them where they got very muddy. I tossed them in the washing machine and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Debrenee Fisher McGee

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Summer Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the same exact shoe. I buy a new pair every summer because they are my favorite for every activity in my active life and hold up so well. They are my "go to" shoe for every day whether it's working in the garden, spending the day at a water or theme park, shopping, etc. I wear a 7.5 and that's the size I purchase. They fit my high arches and give me the support I need. Being adjustable, you can make them as tight or loose on your foot as you like. Can you say I love them?? lol Most definitely!!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking/walking sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: August , 2020 - I really don’t write reviews often, however was totally blown away at how amazingly comfortable and supportive these sandals are. I have super high arches plus planter Fasciitis but when wearing these sandals, all discomfort completely disappears. I’m walking on a cloud that molds to my feet perfectly. Note: The straps adjust nicely and are well padded, no shifting around at all and No pinching at all. I’m usually a 10 which were a little too small. I ordered an 11 and now have a perfect fit. Kicking my hiking boots to the curb and am about to hike Catalina island in these, will update when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Mackekat

customer_reviews.title: Typical great Teva sandal...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable walking sandal right from the first. Not too much arch support - I tend to favor a more "barefoot" approach. Straps fit well and I really like that they're all adjustable. Just to add an extra plus - saw a friend wearing the exact same sandals. She said she also loves her's and wears them everywhere. On the caution side, they run a tad small in length. I'm a 8M consistently and find there's not much room in front of my toes. I would not wear these on any kind of rocky trail or beach. The price was lovely. Thanks, Teva!
customer_reviews.author: MaryJOx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support in a nice looking sandal
customer_reviews.text: After several surgeries on my feel for Morton's Neuroma, two knee replacements and back surgery, I need a sandal that provides good padding, excellent arch support and unparalleled stability. I found these three things in the Teva Tirra. For years I only wore the all-leather Teva hiking sandal, but they have changed and no longer meet my needs. I also tried numerous other brands such as Rockport (fair), Sketchers (POOR), and others. I like this sandal--it's the closest I have found to the hiking sandal. I ordered the Bering Sea in blue, since I needed a blue sandal, but liked it so much, I have ordered it again in black/black. I sure do wish it came in a dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: BookLady56

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Provides support, not blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! I've been wearing these sandals daily for about a month now. They're lightweight and flattering yet sturdy and provide support for my arches. Unlike other sandals, there's no uncomfortable rubbing from the straps so no need to worry about getting blisters. The other reviews are right that there is a thin film of something on the underside of the sandals when you first receive them, but after wearing them on rough concrete, it quickly goes away so no worries. My only complaint is that the velcro is starting to come off the main strap so I'll need to sew it back on. Otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: liked so well, I ordered some for my daughters.
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely high arches, and have been "stuck wearing sneakers" most of the time to avoid foot pain. After researching I decided to try this brand, and chose this color simply because it was the least expensive color. I highly expected to end up sending them back. To my surprise, they fit perfectly and after several days of wear I had NO arch pain. ZERO. I then bought 2 pair for my daughters as well. I am thankful to have gotten a good price, but honestly, I'd pay more if I needed to. They are feminine looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Dainty but tough
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try these sandals because they look dainty, like they just aren't appropriate for walking and hiking. I have yet to try them on a hike, but they seem sturdy, have a good supportive soul and fit like a glove due to the multi-strap adjustments. I am generally between a normal and a wide width and like another person mentioned, if your feet tend to be wide the straps are too short which I would have to agree. The one strap for me secures but not by much. I am hopeful it will hold and or these might stretch a tad. But for the price, I'm going to give 'em hell.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I needed summer walking sandals to wear on the greenway for long walks with my dogs, that would hold up to the occasional sprint and jumping into the stream. And, hopefully, that weren't too ugly. Oh my do these fit the bill!! I usually wear a size 6.5-7 and whole sizes in 7 sometimes run too large/long, but these fit perfectly. I'm flat footed and the moderate arch support was just right. And these are about as cute as you get for a true performance sandal. Thank you Teva for designing an active girl's dream come true!
customer_reviews.author: BonnieInNC

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for hard wearing hiking and casual use
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel great. The insole is comfortable and grippy. No sliding of bare feet inside the sandals. The straps are handsome, wear well, and are of a material that remains clean looking after use. They still look new. The degree of adjustability is great. The only design flaw is that the toe straps should reach base of toes and cover the “toe cleavage”. The entire toe section of foot beyond the ball of foot is exposed, and this looks a bit odd. It feels and looks unprotected for hiking. But I can’t argue with the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: daisy_miller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and slip resistant for walking
customer_reviews.text: I love the sandals. I have had problem feet for a long time. So, I have not worn sandals. I took a chance because I was told that Teva sandals are very comfortable, and that you don't need to worry about falling easily. Also, product description explicitly claimed that there were Velcro straps at both ends of the sandal. Normally I need a wide shoe/sandal. I have worn these sandals all day, for almost a week. They were very comfortable from the minute I put them on. I have been on my feet quite a bit, recently. They also have very nice grips underneath to keep me from slipping in them, while walking around. I would definitely purchase them, again..
customer_reviews.author: catlover

customer_reviews.title: Best so far.. but
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Teva, Keen, and Columbia sandals. I'm no longer in my twenties looking for something cute for my camping trips, I need some support. This provides me with ankle support and arch support. These are my favorite sandals ever. Full disclosure CONS: -There is a line on the sole right under the toes, It has to be the biggest design flaw. After taking a few steps, it begins to itch and after a few minutes it hurts. -The velcro is starting to lose its stickiness
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the opportunity to try
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because my feet are long and very narrow. I have never had a pair of sandals that fit. I know most people buy these for hiking or other outdoor adventures but I bought them to wear every day. They are ugly. They don't look nice with pretty clothes but at 72 I care a bit less than I did at 71. So I wear them. Thanks for making a shoe that fits me. I guess there are more shoes out there but they probably cost a lot more and are even uglier. I'm glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G

customer_reviews.title: Painful straps
customer_reviews.text: I love these and really wanted to keep them. The foot bed was supportive and comfortable They were great when I tried them at home and then 1 day at work, but when I took only a 2-mile walk in them (on a soft track!) I found the straps very painful. They chafed my toes no matter how I adjusted them. I also found, like many others, that the front straps did not have enough Velcro to get tightened properly. I'm sending them back and trying Keens. These won't work for my 500-mile walk.
customer_reviews.author: jewel115

customer_reviews.title: 10 months post fall from a ladder and in love
customer_reviews.text: 10 months post initial fall from ladder. 4 surgeries later I have found and fallen in love with a pair of shoes. They have excellent arch support and just make my feet happy. If my right foot is happy, I’m happy. If I’m happy the world continues to turn properly. Must buy another pair for backup. If something happens to these there will be universal problems and none of us want that. I honestly wish everyone in the world could feel the intense pleasure I am experiencing right now over a pair of shoes!!!! Much love to whoever made these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Velina

customer_reviews.title: Great for Walking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as they were recommended for walking the Walt Disney Parks for the week. I was looking for comfort over style, but these are both. I am getting older and don’t want fancy heeled sandals any more. These are so comfortable. I have a high arch and these support it like nothing else I’ve owned. Love love love these.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this exact shoe I buy. My first pair lasted many years of heavy rough wear and tear. A year ago I bought a different cheaper Teva model, which made me realize what a much better design this more expensive Tirra model has. If you have a narrow or wide foot, it doesn’t mater because it’s fully adjustable. The shoe is well made and of good quality material. The Velcro continues to hold even after a lot of hiking with water and mud. It has excelled arch support and it’s extremely comfortable. I have more expensive and good quality sandals but I find these more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals and I own them in 4 different colors. I've replaced my black and my beige sandals with new ones twice. They last for years -- I bought my first pairs of black and beige sandals about 12 years ago & just replaced them for the second time. Because all of the straps are adjustable, they should fit any foot width. I have found you can even go up or down 1/2 size to get the color you want and you'll still be able to adjust them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet! Adorable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and was looking for open toe hiking shoes that were adjustable at the toe box. These are perfect! I normally wear a 9 wide and even then some shoes pinch the sides of my feet. Other reviews say they run a little big, but I ordered a 9 (normally need a 9W or 9.5) and they fit perfectly. The sole is thick and cushioned. I haven't worn them out yet but will update my review when I do. Love the colors and now won't have hot feet when I'm hiking! **UPDATE** Wore these while on a camping trip. They were super comfortable, and dried quickly on my feet after getting wet. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: NCC

customer_reviews.title: Not made the same as previous pairs.
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of this teva tirra sandal. I ordered another as a spare, since i like it so much. However, this sandal i received is not made the same as my other two of this exact style name and i returned it. The heel straps are not cut as high nor as deep and felt completely too low, as if my heel wasn’t supported and it pushed my foot forward. Also the insole area where the instep straps emerge from the foot bed is nicely finished in my other pairs. Not so on this pair, there is a small gap which my foot could feel and was not acceptable. I gave three stars for effort.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Loooovvvee!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a flip flop kind of girl but needed to find better shoe wear for longer walks. These are my first pair of sandals and I absolutely loooovvveee them. I have flat feet and they adjust to my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald & Desiree Piele

customer_reviews.title: Caused blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a sandal to walk in as my feet sweat so much when it’s hot. Reviews were positive in that people used them for walking, hiking, etc but sadly I ended up with blisters in 2 spots on each foot after my first wearing. Admittedly I did go 4 miles and am hopeful that if I wear them for shorter distances over time my feet will adapt. Still, was disappointed that I spent $ on sandals I can’t yet wear for their intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jkl

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about the adjustable fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Teva Tirra sandals, and I dearly love this shoe. I have WIDE FEET, and because ALL the straps are adjustable, They always fit perfectly. I have walked all over Disney World for four days, with just these sandals, with never a blister, cramp or any other kind of foot problem. I can not emphasis what a fabulous sandal this is for anyone who is active in really hot weather. Also - they come in lots of cool color combinations. I dearly love my Teva sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Bad production on these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Cute, although the color is more pink than taupe. But the sandals are different lengths! They are marked as the same size, but if you line the heels up against a straight surface, one is clearly longer than the other. And the plastic strap holder on the longer one is much higher than on the shorter one, so it digs into my ankle bone. I've worn this same Teva sandal style for years and never had this problem before. It's a shame to return them, but I know I can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Della Street

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! With one issue...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I lost my flip flops right before our cruise! I was warned that I should break them in before we leave, but I didn't have time. I wore these the entire time with no issue. I do wish they had more slip resistance. One of the days is was sprinkling and we were on an excursion. They took us inside out of the rain and while walking down some concrete/tile steps, I slipped and twisted my knee and bruised my elbows. I was ok, but I do wish it had a little more resistance on the bottom. Overall They were comfortable for the entire week!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good support and customized fit for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: Fit: I have narrow feet. I like that i can get a perfect fit by adjusting all the straps separately. Comfort: I can wear them all day. They did need a breaking in period. I wore them around the house with socks on for a few days, then without socks. Support: I have plantar fasciitis and the arch support is great in these sandals. Uses: I’ve used them as swim shoes, for long walks, everyday wear Durability: Seems to hold up to constant wear. I put them in the wash and air dry when I need to wear them in the house during plantar fasciitis flare ups.
customer_reviews.author: NY-shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how worn out my old Tevas were until I got the new pair. This style is amazingly comfortable and supportive. I will order more of them.
customer_reviews.author: ach

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and cute
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this sandal in black after I broke my hip. Wanted a cute sandal that was supportive as I cannot for the time being wear my dozens of flip flops. Familiar with Teva from years ago and loved them. My only gripe with this one (black did not have the issue) is that the main strap does not lie down flat. So when I extend it fully in order to easily get my foot into it it catches on the slight overhang of the strap and needs me to manually flatten the end of the strap to get it through the loop. Wish there were more colors b/c if so I would probably buy them all!
customer_reviews.author: Rakhi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great walking/hiking sandals! Very comfortable. I brought several shoes for my 2 week vacation to Greece but ended up wearing this pair most of the days. We walked a lot and these sandals became my favorite go-to shoes. They are light but sturdy. They served well in the city as well as on the longer, rougher trails out of town. I made the miscalculation of not wearing proper hiking shoes on a hike from Fira to Oia in Santorini, but fortunately I was wearing these sandals. I should still have worn proper hiking shoes, but glad I was at least wearing these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Won't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Teva fan for YEARS but these let me down. Even with the straps all the way snug they were too big. The material seems like it has gone down in quality over the years. But most importantly the bottom of the shoe had a cotton like feel too it which makes the slippery on my hard wood floors. If the soles had been complete rubber I would keep them but I feel like I am going to slip and break a hip in these.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm Footbed
customer_reviews.text: The footbed seems to be really firm. Maybe after a break-in period they would be a little more comfortable, but I'm finding the combination of the firm footbed and the positioning of the ankle strap to be less desirable than I had hoped for. I normally wear a 6.5 and purchased these in a 6.5. In this case going up half a size to the 7 might have been better. I just don't like the way it feels around the ankle and will likely have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love’em
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair of sandals, these and another brand. The other brand was comfy, good support, etc, but can not compare to these Tevas. The adjustable straps at the toe made all the difference. If you need arch support and have issues with swollen feet in the heat, this is the sandal for you. I have fallen arches that need support. Without good arch support my pronation causes bursitis in my knees and hips, IT band issues, as well as issues with plantar fasciitis. These sandals have good support and I can tell that my orthopedic issues will not flare up this summer. I will be buying these in another color soon.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyOfMaine

customer_reviews.title: Good fit with usual size, not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I've been in the market for a good "sport" sandal for a while now. I have a friend who lives her Tevas, so I decided to try these out. And I am so glad I did! I have a small foot, but tend to have to go up in size due to them being a little wide. I picked these up in my usual size and they are a perfect fit. The straps around the foot are adjustable as well, helpful in getting just the right fit. Also, they are not overly bulky like some sport sandals I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Too many frustrating things...
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to love this shoe since I really liked the colors. This is open toe, meaning ALL of all of your toes will be open and hanging out. The heal cushion made me feel like I was falling backwards. The Velcro is not stitched to the edge, is too short (to where you need to pull to fit) and seems to be ready to fall off. Too many little things to keep this shoe, returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Durable, No Break-In Period
customer_reviews.text: I got these sandals right before we headed to Mexico because I couldn't find my Chacos. I didn't have time to break them in, so I was a little nervous to wear them on a full-day adventure in Mexico. Luckily, there was no break-in period! I wore them all day and my feet didn't hurt, no blisters, just comfort and functionality. Personally, I think most sporty sandals are pretty ugly, but these are some of the best looking ones I've seen or had. I highly recommend these babies if you need a water-friendly sandal for your adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Not for small feet
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Tevas! I was really looking forward to these. They are made very well. However, after wearing them for a short walk, I have a blister on the side of my ankle. I feel as though these heavier duty Tevas are not for small feet. I'm a narrow size 5. The wider ankle strap on these are too wide and don't mold to my foot like some of the other styles. I am still a loyal Teva fan, and I'm learning what styles work and which don't for my tiny feet.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Moreno

customer_reviews.title: These are WONDERFUL and have support!
customer_reviews.text: These are WONDERFUL and have support! I have issues with my feet and ankles etc. and have despaired of finding ANY SHOE of ANY TYPE that would work for me. The arch support on these is very nice, firm but NOT hard, fits my foot well and I wear a size 9M and that is the size I ordered and they fit perfect! I have this shoe in 2 different colors and they were BOTH well made and comfortable. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: No925r

customer_reviews.title: Overall a decent sandal
customer_reviews.text: Pro: shoes are comfortable fit well with velcro straps for a wide range of adjustment Con: They are overpriced The sole of the shoe is a foam type material that dents and tears fairly easily. This is only a problem in front of the toe area. It would be better if the rubber sole went up to the toe area of the sandal Overall they are a decent sandal. The have decent support and feel secure on the feet. I worry that the velcro straps may not hold up for as long, but so far have not had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking!
customer_reviews.text: I walk typically 10,000 steps a day and I got these sandals to relieve what I thought was a start of a bunion from wearing wrong shoes for steps and work. The first few days of wearing that foot had pain in that area and I’m sure it was due to fixing the alignment in that area. Now going into week 2 of wearing daily they will great. I notice the bunion bump is smaller too. I’d recommend for those struggling with this issue too!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalWestie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sandals didn’t work for me, will be returning. It is too tight around the ankle, or if the ankle strap is adjusted and not tight around the ankle, then the hill is moving up and down, thus, back of the hill is rubbing against back strap. Positive parts: it has good arch support and all streps are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: At least a size smaller than the tag indicates
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these sandals. These new ones are definitely sized differently than my previous ones - they are 1 cm shorter and all of the straps are shorter too. My toes are hanging off the tops and the arch is in the wrong place. However the size and model info printed on the strap are correct. The sandals arrived with no tags attached and no box like Teva's normally do - while I appreciate having less packaging, I have to wonder if these are really Tevas.. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used these with and without socks for a hiking trip requiring me to be in areas walking through streams and water. I removed my socks during these times and found the shoe to work great. However, I did get some chafing to my ball of my foot and across the straps over my toes and areas of the ankle. Certainly I would suggest using socks which defeats the purpose of an open sandal but maybe my skin is just extra sensitive to rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna U

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR Comfort and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the most attractive shoe but definitely PURE COMFORT! I purchased these shoes for a trip to Disney. I wore them for many, many hours with no blisters or problems at all. I also purchased other shoe styles made specifically for 'walking' and these shoes were the most comfortable, by far. This style is the perfect choice for anyone that expects to do an extreme amount of walking or standing. Great arch support, non-slippery sole, quick drying material. The blue color goes great with anything denim. The Velcro straps are adjustable around the ankle and across the toes. This is handy to allow extra room if feet swell. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Granna

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, orger 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Just got this pair so it will take a day or two. The pair I wear all the time is 10 years old - after being washed they look new and work well. The new ones are not quite as comfortable and they do run large. My old pair is a size 6, my feet are a 7 [they have grown 1/2 size over the years]. Since I did not buy my original pair from Amazon but in a store, I took a chance on 6.5 this time, they run a little big but ok.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Jordon

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap to High on foot
customer_reviews.text: Love the style! But when I put them on I couldn't bend my ankle. The ankle strap hits right on it in the front. Very uncomfortable!! Couldn't even walk in them. Sorry Teva I love all my sandals I have purchased from you but this one really disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The. Best.
customer_reviews.text: I got the Halcon Gloxinia style - the color is much more vibrant than in the picture which I like better. I am normally a 7.5 and sometimes an 8 is too big. I did order the 8 because some reviews said that some styles run small. It fits absolutely perfectly. The adjustable straps help make it more custom fitting too. I did see at least one review that mentioned that the Velcro didn’t line up, but I can’t see how, unless you are trying to velcro on the wrong strap - which I did the first time I put it on. Hands down well worth the money - comfortable, stylish, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Not for wide feet! Perfect for medium width! Thought the footbed is comfortable, the straps are not. The velcro at the fore foot barely closed. I got he black which seemed much narrower/tighter than the navies I tried at the store.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Teva shoes. From discard pile?
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective and it didn’t find out till I put them on April 14 on a cruise ship out of internet for 8 days. I HAVE BEEN RIPPED OFF WITH NO RECOURSE The buckles that hold the main foot strap twist around till the buckle is sideways to dig into the foot. I tried sewing it down but still it is crooked. Now you have to buy new shoes in Europe. And I will never trust amazon for shoes again . Do not buy amazon if you are saving bee shoes for a trip
customer_reviews.author: Karen Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Best footwear I have worn.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit perfect and are the most comfortable footwear I have ever worn. I just walked most of today in Santa Fe and my feet and back feel great. Usually my feet and back are hurting in half the time I spent walking today. I was able to wear them with a dress and they still looked cute. I think I will buy another pair as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Safferdian

customer_reviews.title: Not the leather Tirra Sandal, but wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sandal for it's fit - the straps adjust so well that it fits my wide feet (most shoes don't) but would fit a narrow foot as well. Super comfortable, zero break-in period. This from someone really has trouble finding comfortable shoes, partly due to wide feet. It is lighter than the leather Tirra, and not quite as well-made, but it's meant to hold up to water use, so I think that's why. The only slight downside (and reason for 4 starts) is the pattern on the footbed can be felt, and I wonder if it could irritate over time, but so far so good. All-in-all, delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Uh mazing
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. These. Shoes. I had a bunion surgery 6 months ago, and I planned a trip to Portugal and didn’t want to pack a huge pair of hiking boots, but needed good arch support, etc (embarrassing to say at only 30 years old lol). I wore these the whole time. And walked an average of 12 miles a day - up hills, on cobblestones, in the water. It feels like you’re walking on a cloud. Honestly, walking a couple of miles in my Brooks sneakers makes my bad foot swell and ache but in these shoes I didn’t feel a thing. I’m now a Teva - for-lifer
customer_reviews.author: Samantha W.

customer_reviews.title: Teva Tirra Sandals are SOOO Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Teva Tirra sandals in the summer. This is my 3rd pair. I have 2 other pairs with different colors. They are really comfortable and supportive. I have Plantar's fasciitis, and I need good supportive shoes. I also like the fact that they are so easy to clean if you get them dirty! I use these for everyday use and for walking/hiking. I highly recommend these shoes. I don't think you would be disappointed with them.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but I’m not in love. I ordered a 5.5. I would say they run true to size. Unlike other reviewers, I did not find them to run long. My foot is on the wider side, and the straps adjusted well to fit my foot. They are lightweight, and the footbed is extremely comfortable. My only complaint is that the ankle strap is thick and sits up high on my ankle. With lots of walking, I foresee it rubbing and causing a blister.
customer_reviews.author: ThreeGuitarz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and my doctor recommended that I buy a pair of Teva's for wearing around the house. I've seen Teva's in shoe stores before, but hesitated to buy them because of the price point and the style isn't my usual taste. These sandals are so comfortable, though; they are well worth the cost. These have become one of my most favorite pairs of shoes to wear now. I can walk without constant pain. I will be buying another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: SweeTei

customer_reviews.title: So disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I love the way they fit and feel. This was perfect. The only problem is that the velcro started to detached from the upper straps after 2 days even though I did not expose them to water and not even did much at all with them not even wearing them for a full 2 hours. I love the shoes, I wish I would have getting something more reliable for the price. I am returning them. I am adding to my review a little over a year later. I did not use those everyday, only to go walk, not even hiking. Now the sole of the right foot is unglued from the shoes. An other disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Marie glasheen

customer_reviews.title: Where have these sandals been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Oh man are these comfortable!!! I get pain sometimes at the ball of my foot if i stand for long periods of time, but not with these! Very comfortable from day one. I have an ElliptiGO stand up bike and ride with these, as well as wear for leisure. Love them so much! Will be going to Hawaii soon and they will be my go to hiking shoe. Important to note I wear a size 6 1/2 to 7 but bought the 6 or 37 in European size (looked at other shoes owned) so glad i went with European size because they fit perfectly. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi K

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are blowing my mind with comfort. There is actually arch support and a cushy heal!!! I just ordered another pair of Tevas, as I believe I have found the perfect sandal. Great adjustability too!
customer_reviews.author: Jen N

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly comfortable! I have several developing issues occurring with age (bunions & hammer toes), and several experiences with a sprained left ankle. I'm an active person: gym, swim, kayak, camping, and having good shoes is essential for me. Shoes that I once loved that I can't wear anymore (like my old classic Tevas) etc have been replaced with more comfortable ones. Whatever anyone is posting in here complaining about size are simply NOT adjusting any or all of the straps to fit their own unique feet as needed. I highly recommend these. They felt good on my feet the moment that I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical ordering these sandals as I have such a hard time finding sandals that fit & are comfortable. I was prepared to return them. However, once I received them, I was very impressed with the fit, look and comfort. I've now worn them for hours at a time with significant walking and no problems at all. I'll be ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: gmreich

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Teva sandals because of a few reviewers who said the arch support was good. They were right. The arch support is excellent. These sandals fit my feet perfectly and I have short, somewhat wide feet. And, even with an ankle injury, I am still able to wear these sandals with the ankle strap. These sandals are comfortable. I can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these COMFORTABLE sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I asked my podiatrist before purchasing these Teva sandals. She gave me an enthusiastic thumbs-up, saying she really likes Teva footwear. I typically buy a “wide” shoe, as I have a pronounced bunion on one foot. I also deal with tingling and pain in the other foot, due to a neuroma. Oh, and then there’s my plantar fasciitis. My feet have issues! The adjustable straps on the Teva Tirra sandal allow me to personalize the fit. They are wonderfully comfortable, without looking too “clunky.” I think they’re kind of cute! I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable, but I felt like they developed a smell right away. I’ve never had any sort of sandal smell as your feet aren’t stuffed in and have access to hair to breathe and dry off, so I assume it’s something with the material. I don’t think it would hold me back from purchasing a second pair as I’m more concerned with comfort and durability (which this shoe provides), but it’s still a little annoying nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable shoe sandal for water or anywhere
customer_reviews.text: These were not a recent purchase (bought in Dec 2015 when featured as a deal of the day), but they have been a very comfortable shoe that I purchased initially as a water shoe though have found them extremely comfortable to wear on hard tile floors (the hard floors were causing major problems until I tried wearing these inside the house) recently. Though I prefer a slide around the house. These have turned out to be an all around comfortable shoe for walking and wearing anywhere since they have the secure back strap. Also they are easily adjustable since other straps have velcro to adjust fit in several places. These are very well made and the fabric straps are strong.
customer_reviews.author: angelluv

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take to Costa Rica and between my Brooks sneakers and these I did great. I have flat feet, a bit overweight and messed my heel in June. I did not buy the traditional version of these because my feet need to be more encapsulated and also I had bought a similar version of them , Sketchers, and the triangle piece on the side of the shoe bothered me. I had to play with the straps some but now they are my go to shoe. Not my type of fashion but my feet feel great.
customer_reviews.author: J.F

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of 7.5 Teva Women's Tirra sandals 3-4 years ago and have worn them daily every summer since then. They're very comfortable and provide a lot of cushion and arch support. I ordered a new pair (size 7.5) only because the velcro doesn't stick as well as it once did, but found the sandals were too short. Amazon made it very easy to exchange them for size 8.0.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sandal that I could wear walking the dog, hiking or just out and about. I have had recurring issues with plantar fasciitis and am always wary of sandals. The support is never quite right. These Teva sandals offer excellent support both across the band of foot muscle on the sole along with arch support. I have worn them all day without a hitch. Very happy to find a comfortable sandal at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: mmv

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for walking which is what I bought them for
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for walking which is what I bought them for. The straps are pretty bulky though so the sandals are not as cute as I'd hoped and I need to pack another more delicate looking sandal for work. My feet also get warmer than I'd like in these sandals and the straps are a bit rough but I'm hoping they'll soften with more wear. They work well (so far) for long walks and get my feet up high enough away from the ground that I don't end up with a lot of gravel/debris getting in under my feet. A great sandal for walking/comfort but a bit too athletic looking to wear with some summery skirts/dresses/work pants.
customer_reviews.author: MKG

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I own. I have been wearing them constantly since they arrived. I have to be careful about the shoes I wear because sometimes they cause me back pain. I can wear these all day long without any issues at all. Even on long walks these shoes work great! I absolutely love the style and color as well! I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Finally shoes that fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my feet and especially toes. I have been searching for the last five years for a comfortable shoe to work with my old feet. These Sandals are wonderful and do not hurt my feet at all. Easily adjustable and good arch support for me. Sure can’t wear them outdoors in our snows, but I will be wearing them all winter inside.
customer_reviews.author: GGMA

customer_reviews.title: these shoes vary
customer_reviews.text: I have other pairs of this shoe bought at different times, the Velcro on these shoes (mango) was to short to remain fastened. It seems Teva is having quality control problems, these are not cheap shoes and each pair should fit the same. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Mudbugs

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing! I weigh 245 and have a wide 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! I weigh 245 and have a wide 8 foot. It literally feels like walking on air. There is so much spring to these babies. The adjustable straps make my feet feel secure. I have one foot slightly larger than the other so the velcro is awesome. I will be wearing these to Europe. I tried the Amazon try before you buy program-Amazon Wardrobe and was able to try 5 different shoes without paying a dime until I found the right one and these are it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney Universal trip.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for 10 days straight, basically out of the box. These sandals took me walking 10 miles a day , on all the water rides, roller coasters, Dr Doom drops, and kiddie rides , up hills and stairs, through puddles, into various fake castles for various reason, to the pool, in the rain, sun, etc. They were exactly right for what I needed them for. Also comfy for carrying your kid's camp luggage up a steep partially paved hill to his cabin during a freak pop up thunderstorm.
customer_reviews.author: HockeyFan

product_meta.title: Teva Women's Tirra Sandal
product_meta.description:
Teva Women's Sandal. Treated with microban, a zinc-based antimicrobial technology that helps prevent stink. Avoid exposure to high temperatures and prolonged periods in direct sunlight

~~~The Tirra by Teva was designed specifically for a woman's foot in order to provide unmatched comfort and performance in the water. With its unmistakably feminine strap configuration and multiple adjustment options for a secure fit, the Tirra can tackle any obstacle with ladylike grace – just like you. The rubber outsole offers uncompromised grip and a water-channeling lug pattern helps to maintain solid footing.~~~

Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.

See more
feature_bullets: Sporty sandal featuring logo and multiple straps with hook-and-loop closures
